title: djavu
description: The secret of happiness is to be in harmony with yourself; little more is permitted or desirable. Seek your environment and adapt it: do not ask me what is ‘yourself’—I know only vaguely what I have made from Self into myself.

The secret of happiness is to be in harmony with yourself; little more is permitted or desirable. Seek your environment and adapt it: do not ask me what is ‘yourself’—I know only vaguely what I have made from Self into myself.
